meanings.definition: The state or quality of being imperfect.
meanings.sent1: Her drawing showed some imperfectness in the lines.
meanings.sent2: The imperfectness of the cake was evident in its lopsided shape.
meanings.sent3: Despite its imperfectness, the painting had a unique charm.
meanings.sent4: The imperfectness of the old bridge added character to the town.
meanings.sent5: The imperfectness of the plan became apparent as they encountered obstacles.

meanings.definition: A flaw or defect in something.
meanings.sent1: The imperfectness of the mirror was seen in its cracked surface.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the imperfectness of the vase when a chip fell off.
meanings.sent3: The imperfectness of the joke made everyone laugh even harder.
meanings.sent4: The imperfectness of the diamond made it unique among the flawless ones.
meanings.sent5: The imperfectness of the road caused many drivers to take alternate routes.
